INVERSION count check and solvability
6 13 7 10 8 9 11 0 15 2 12 5 14 3 1 4   n=4 x= 3 IC = 62 YES
3 9 1 15 14 11 4 6 13 0 10 12 2 7 8 5   n = 4 x = 2 IC = 56 NO
